title: VEVOR Commercial Convection Oven, 66L/60Qt, Half-Size Conventional Oven Countertop, 1800W 4-Tier Toaster w/Front Glass Door, w/Trays Wire Racks Clip Gloves, 120V
description: key Features60Qt/66L Spacious InteriorThis half-size toaster oven boasts a 2.33 Cu. Ft. inner space, measuring 18.5"x15.4"x14.2". The 4-layer interior is adequate to bake multiple dishes at once.360°Hot Air CirculationThe heating element on this oven is 1800W. The noise-free fan continuously circulates hot air throughout the chamber, boosting cooking efficiency and baking foods uniformly.Timer & Temp Control KnobThe temp adjuster (0-500℉) and timer knob (0-120 min) bring you the convenient and precise control of the convection oven. You can freely set the heating temp between 150-500℉. Plus, over-temp protection is also integrated.Well-Built ConstructionThe entire stainless-steel body gives this countertop oven excellent durability. The front door embraces handy features, such as dual-pane tempered glass, stainless frame, magnetic sealing strip, and cool-touch handle. Besides, oven light, air vents, and foot pads are also thoughtfully equipped.Complete Accessories IncludedOur electric convection oven comes with 4 removable wire racks (18.1"x13.0") 1 food tray, 1 bread clip, and 1 pair of gloves.Perfect for Various Food TypesIt is ideal for various delicate and flaky baked foods, such as pizza, bread, crisp, cookie, french fries, chicken, and so on.SpecificationsModel: FD-66Voltage: 120V/60HzPower: 1800 WCapacity: 60 QtNumber of Layers: 4Heating Temp Range: 150-500℉Timer: 0-120 minMaterial: Stainless Steel + Tempered GlassWire Rack Size: 18.1"x13.0"Interior Dimensions: 18.5"x15.4"x14.2"Exterior Dimensions: 22.8"x21.7"x19.7"Product Weight: 52.0 lbsPackage Content1 x Commercial Convection Oven4 x Wire Racks1 x Food Tray1 x Bread Clip1 x Pair of Gloves1 x User Manual
